'''Christopher John Gilson''' (June [[1953]]) is a leading member in the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], and the chief editor of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]''. Together with [[Carl F. Hostetter]], [[Arden R. Smith]], [[Bill Welden]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]] he is in the ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'' review committee.
